Click For Help

Click to catch rats in your kitchen, the quicker you catch them, the more points you will earn, just do it!

Don't let any rat run away!
When you miss a rat, you will lose 1000 points as punishment

Occasionally, Jerry will come out looking for cheese, don't let him go since catching him will give you double points!

If Tom coming, don't hit him otherwise you'll lose a lot of points!

The level will be up if enough rats are caught. Along with level up, rats' running speed also increase.

After your score hit 1000000 points, you will win the game. If you score is lower than 0, you will lose!

Ok, catch'em All!
